description: The round payoff this round was 90. You, Kate chose to play option 1.John chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 45.
Cooperation can lead to a higher payoff
The game involves strategic decision-making based on expected outcomes (due to the different payoff structures for different player combinations),
Information about past rounds can influence future decisions (as actions are revealed and can inform strategy),
Risk and reward are balanced differently across the options (with option 2 involving a risk of zero payoff but a potential solo gain),
